results.title: Bitcoin rallies to $71.5K after historic sell-off, but derivatives metrics remain soft
results.description: Bitcoin price soared back above $71,000, but BTC options data shows pro traders are still extremely cautious about the sustainability of the rebound rally. Is the sell-off really over?

results.title: Justin Bieber Paid $1.3 Million for a Bored Ape NFT. It's Now Worth $12K
results.description: Back when NFTs were hot, Justin Bieber dropped $1.3 million to join the Bored Ape Yacht Club. The Ethereum NFTs now start at just $12K.

results.title: Crypto’s stress test hits balance sheets as Bitcoin, Ether collapse
results.description: Crypto’s downturn is rippling through treasuries, ETFs and mining infrastructure, exposing how digital asset volatility reshapes balance sheets and operations.

results.title: AI platform founded by Crypto.com's Kris Marszalek launches AI agents

results.title: President Trump Launches TrumpRx, Promising Lower Drug Prices: Is It Legit?
results.description: The White House is betting that a new cash-pay platform—built around blockbuster GLP-1 drugs—can pressure Big Pharma and bypass the middlemen who keep U.S. prices high.

results.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today

results.title: Bithumb confirms reward payout error after abnormal Bitcoin trades

results.title: Bitfarms Stock Pumps as It Dumps Bitcoin Mining for AI With Name Change, Move to US
